document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#107cff">stole </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">along </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb856">stealthy </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#889098">Suspicion </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">done </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb856">dim </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#54f4ff">wealthy </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6c88ff">Beginning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
